DOC.brief_title: Helping Youth Smokers Stop Smoking Through Youth Quitline Programme
DOC.detailed_description: In Hong Kong , demand smoke cessation service Youth increase past 10 year , first youth-oriented smoking cessation hotline `` Youth Quitline '' establish 2005 . From August 2005 July 2016 , `` Youth Quitline '' receive 9,267 telephone inquiry provide telephone smoking cessation counsel 1,952 youth smoker . The Youth Quitline aim help youth smoker quit smoke reduce cigarette consumption , also promote smoke-free message public . Youth smoker recruit use reactive proactive strategy . The operation hour Quitline service weekdays 17:00 21:00 weekend 14:00 20:00 . A questionnaire ask smoking status , dependency level perceive barrier smoker design assess status participant baseline , brief counselling use motivational intervention approach deliver phone call . Telephone counsel 1-week , 1-month , 3-month , 6-month , 9-month , 12-month follow-up 24-month conducted participant ass smoke status ( questionnaire ) reinforce intervention ( encourage quit provide quit tip ) . Self-reported quitter quit smoke least 7 day 6-month invited perform saliva cotinine test ( use NicAlert strip ) plus exhaled carbon monoxide text validate smoking status .
